briefTitle: A Long-term Study of DE-114 Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis
officialTitle: A Long-term Open-label Study of DE-114 Ophthalmic Solution in Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis - Phase 3 -
summary: Safety and efficacy of DE-114 ophthalmic solution will be evaluated in patients with allergic conjunctivitis, in an open-label, multicenter study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Ocular Itching Score by Visit
